title: ExtendedStringGetFromPointNum (Method)
text:
METHOD ExtendedStringGetFromPointNum :
Error
Get the value of Extended String datapoint (DNP3 object group 114 âextended stringsâ) with given point number (0 .. MaxPointNum).
Returns PointNotExistent, if a datapoint with the given point number doesnt exist, OK otherwise.
The caller has to provide a buffer where to store the Extended String value.
Eventually the Extended String value exceeds the provided buffer, in this case Error.NoMemory will be returned,
nevertheless the first maxLenStrBuf bytes of value are copied to pStrBuf.

rows: Pointer to buffer where to store the Extended String value
Maximum number of bytes to store in pStrBuf

flags received from Outstation. Flag values are ORâdcombinations of the following:DNPDEFS_DBAS_FLAG_ON_LINE - the point has been readsuccessfullyDNPDEFS_DBAS_FLAG_RESTART - the field device that originated thedata object has been restarted. This device may be the deviced
reporting this data object.DNPDEFS_DBAS_FLAG_COMM_LOST - the device reporting this data objecthas lost communication with the originator of the data objectDNPDEFS_DBAS_FLAG_REMOTE_FORCED - the state of the binary objecthas been forced to its current state at the originating device

Time stamp reported - valid if hasTimeStamp = TRUE, invalid
otherwise.
